bench press.full_text: The bench press is a compound upper body exercise. First lie flat on the bench. Grip the bar slightly wider than shoulder width. Lower the bar slowly to your chest. Push the bar upward until arms are fully extended. Always keep feet flat on the ground. Avoid arching your back excessively. Use a spotter for safety.

squat.full_text: The squat is a lower body strength exercise. Stand with feet shoulder width apart. Keep your back straight. Lower your hips until thighs are parallel to the floor. Push through your heels to stand back up. Avoid letting knees collapse inward.
